data.title: ICPertFLRW: Cactus Code thorn for initial conditions
data.name: ICPertFLRW

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "/home/robynm/simulations/helloworld/SIMFACTORY/exe/cactus_sim: /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.8' not found (required by /home/robynm/simulations/helloworld/SIMFACTORY/exe/cactus_sim)"

"Cactus Code Thorn ICPertFLRW" and detailed step-by-step instructions to integrate this thorn into the Einstein Toolkit and run `test.par` indicate it is an executable simulation component rather than a generic library.

"This thorn provides as initial conditions an FLRW metric perturbed with the comoving curvature perturbation Rc... These are then passed to the CT_Dust thorn to be evolved." â€” it directly sets up scientific initial conditions for numerical relativity simulations used in published research.
